com.redhat.rhn.frontend.dto

Class PackageMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.struts.SelectableAdapter
      • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.dto.BaseDto
        • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.dto.PackageMetadata
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Identifiable, Selectable, java.lang.Comparable

    public class PackageMetadata
extends BaseDto
implements java.lang.Comparable
    PackageMetadata represents some information about a Package between two systems or between a system and a profile. This is similar to the hash, array, map or whatever it is on the perl side.

      • getIdCombo

        public java.lang.String getIdCombo()
        Returns the IdCombo which is the nameid, evrid and archid seperated by a pipe (|). nameid|evrid[|archid]. Arch id will only be included if it is available.
        Returns:
        the IdCombo which is the nameid and evrid seperated by a pipe (|).
